jobDescription: Plan and execute quantitative analyses and translate data into actionable insights for marketing and strategy plans.Suggest and provide data-driven analysis for companys key project and executives.Manipulate, transform, and analyze the complex, high-volume, and high dimensional data obtained from the game server, app store and the 3rd parties, such as advertising companies, to obtain meaningful data for marketing and a key decision making purpose.Identify game trends, evaluate business opportunities, and suggest solutions to business problems through data analysis.Develop and improve algorithms to mine meaningful information from large data.Plan, formulate, design and implement experiments to test various models by manipulating or transforming data to improve user experience and increase the user volumes.Prepare data reports for engineering, product, and executive teams and collaborate with them for problem-solving.Serve as an expert in data analysis and management using programming languages such as R, Python, or structured query language.REQUIREMENTS: Minimum Education: Masters Degree in Culture Technology or Information Technology  Minimum Experience: 36 months Special Requirements:At least 3 years of experience in using Tableau, Periscope, or other tools for data analysis and exploration.At least 3 years of experience in professional quantitative analysis using Microsoft Excel.At least 3 years of experience with Structured Query Language (SQL), data warehousing & data modeling for analyzing large data and multiple data sources.At least 3 years of experience in automating analysis using programming languages, including R or Python.OTHER SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: None RATE OF PAY: $76,000.00 per year LOCATION OF EMPLOYMENT: 75 Broadway, Suite 202, San Francisco CA, 94111 CONTACT PERSON: All applications must be submitted to Amanda Koplos by email at amanda@foxcubgames.com
